website_summaries.verdict: We love this model's uncomplicated structure and bonus accessory compartments, but there are other litter pans that do a better job keeping litter and waste in the pan and off the floor.
pros: Wide and lengthy, so it's practical for numerous cats
Features 2 additional small compartments for stashing accessories like waste bags and scoops
Constructed with Microban that reduces bacterial growth and odors
cons: Curved corners are difficult to clean
Sides aren't tall enough to keep waste and litter contained for active "kickers" and cats that tend to stand when urinating

customer_reviews.title: Houston, The Litter Box has landed.
customer_reviews.text: Got this box today. I have no experience with it as a litter box yet, but I'm sure it'll be fantastic. The reviews don't prepare you for how enormous this box is.
customer_reviews.author: dekins

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the stock picture fool you
customer_reviews.text: This cat litter pan is HUGE. Like gigantic. Don't let the stock image fool you. Please see the picture I uploaded. If this is the size that you are looking for then go for it! Quality is nice and it has 2 slots for scopes and other things.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Massive.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure out the space you want to put this in because giant is not an understatement, it's twice as big as our other litter boxes. Kids seem to like it so far. The picture has my 10 lb cat in it showing his approval and the scale.
customer_reviews.author: AFDP

customer_reviews.title: Bigger is better.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 very large cats. I had the biggest litter box that I could find but it was still too small, and now I found this one. I had an oil pan under the old litter box but this is so much bigger and better, I don't need the oil pan now. I don't know if the cats are excited, but I am!!!!!!! I highly recommend this!!!!!.
customer_reviews.author: DIY

customer_reviews.title: Petmate 22040 Giant LItter Pan
customer_reviews.text: Holy ...When they say giant, they mean it! Bought this for my cat who is getting older and I think, losing his vision. He would go in the box but get too close to the edge and end up missing. When it came, the box was so big we thought it was a large car part we ordered!! Its sturdy, well made and so far, is getting the job done. The side holders, we prob wont use. Im writing this review so you get an idea how big it really is! The picture has a standard size roll of paper towels as a reference! Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: NYG_Fan

customer_reviews.title: A litter box for Catzilla!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in two days using Amazon Prime. This thing is huuuuuuge! My boyfriend kept asking what in the world did I order. Looking at the package I wondered too if perhaps I accidentally ordered freaking luggage instead. Jeezus this thing is huge. I would say it's about a foot deep. None of these photos do it justice. I would very much recommend this if you are fostering or have multiple cats. Not as much litter thrown out, but like magicians my cats always find a way to amaze me. How just do they do it??
customer_reviews.author: P. Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Enormous liter box
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. No one is kidding in their review when they say this thing is enormous. You could bath a small dog in this thing. It's the size of my double kitchen sink. Worth the money since it's deep which means no more liter everywhere. My cat likes to dig and send her liter flying. She weighs close to 11lbs. My photo shows the standard store bought liter box for comparison. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: tandag

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to reiterate how HUGE this litter box is. The photo is my 16 year old, 6 foot tall son sitting comfortably inside. And the box and paper it shipped in has already provided my 3 fur kids with hours on enjoyment. Make sure you measure where you are going to place it, to avoid any surprises.
customer_reviews.author: R. White

customer_reviews.title: It's huge
customer_reviews.text: My senior kitty recently started peeing outside her box and we couldn't really figure out why. We've tried a few different litter boxes to suit her changing needs and it looks like this one did the trick: 1. Walls high enough to keep the litter in, but low enough for her aching joints to climb into, 2. Large enough for her to poop in one corner and then pee in the opposite corner 3. Easy to clean and has the storage slots on the side to hold the scoop. If you have the space, I'd highly recommend this box. It's saved me from the endless amount of carpet cleaning I've endured the last few months!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Check dimensions this thing is HUUUUUUGE!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I didn't check dimensions, the price made it seem like a regular litter box! I know it says it's big, but I didn't realize just how big it was. So great value for the money FOR SURE!!! My 6 year old could sleep in this thing!! It is easy to scoop, but when it comes time to dump it is going to be a HUUUUGE chore. Those compartments I can see getting super nasty ...but, oh well.. it does it's job. Overall a good purchase, but cracked me up when I got delivered a box the size of my front door!
customer_reviews.author: Coleen Faircloth

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a maine coon kitten and I researched litter boxes after he kept getting his poo half In and out of the blitter box. Since he has such a long body this litter box was a better fit for him after much research. It really was indeed. He can now have plenty of room and litter stays in the pan. Very happy indeed. Love the two compartments at the end also. They come in handy for the scooper and other things. Very happy with my purchase and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this liter box. I have two Maine Coon cats and they are very big. I could not find a liter box big enough...I am so happy to have found this. I just wish it didn't have the two compartments because if I put things in there, the cats play with it. My cats can stand up comfortably in it, plenty of room for them. It also does not look bad at all. I thought they would get liter everywhere because it does not have a top but it actually gets less liter out of the box than the one with the cover. Very happy. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two cats
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a huge tub with a couple of "pockets" to store things (litter bags, scoop, anti-smelly powder). This is actually the second one that I've purchased because we decided to put another litter box downstairs. This works well for our 2 cats, and when we do a big clean it's easy enough to take outside to hose down. I would definitely recommend it (although you do have to have a good size space to put it).
customer_reviews.author: NnanelleTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! Thank me later.
customer_reviews.text: The one and only litter box that is suitable for multi-cats household. Also I have a chunky nugget that has the most inconvenience with any other litter-box I ever bought Him. Now He is so much more content with the wee&poo situation. I should mention that it will take a Sams Club 30 lb cat litter bail easily. I think it's an 90 lb capacity litter-box. I mean a kid can take a bath in this thing :) Super sturdy material, 2 cubbies for scoops, dustpan and mini broom. My only complain is that Amazon uses the biggest shipping box with this one, when it's not necessary. Amazon, you can do better in conserving the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Spicy Nien

customer_reviews.title: Help Your Big Chonk Cats Poop in Comfort
customer_reviews.text: If you have the space for these babies, get one immediately. Spray the inside with vegetable oil, such as Pam. Makes it easier to clean between litter refills. I bought two. I buy Dr Elsey's litter, 2 big bags should be enough to fill and maintain these for about a month. I never have a smell, dust, or huge tracking problem between maintaining fill space and rugs. It gives my cats adequate space to work their business. They like using them and have plenty of room so they don't throw litter everywhere. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 8bitwhit

customer_reviews.title: Good buy to keep litter off the floor
customer_reviews.text: Initially your cat may not want to use it since it has very high walls on it. Place the cat in the litter box a few times and add a little of it's old litter to help it recognize it's own scent and use it. Pros: - Less litter outside of box. - Has a place to store pooper scooper - Great if you have more than one cat. Cons: - It comes in a huge box. - Not good for a small space or apartment. - requires more litter for cat to be able to cover it's poop properly.
customer_reviews.author: Reec3

customer_reviews.title: Not just for cats
customer_reviews.text: Originally, we purchased one of these in town when it was on sale. We just bought another one here on Amazon for another rabbit we have (same sale price). One uses it as a little box. Both seem to enjoy the boxes as a place to hang out. They are super easy to clean and are sturdy. The rabbits have not chewed on these so far. The size is good for these medium size rabbits. We have not used the side bins for anything except the scoop for one box. We might stuff some hay in there and see how that goes.I would buy one again if needed when they are on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Traleah

customer_reviews.title: It can be modified if you like...
customer_reviews.text: I actually did modify it. I was able to cut the plastic after heating it up with a hair dryer on high heat. I cut the cubbies off cause I didn't have the space to house the entire litter box. I also cut a section so my cat could walk in and out easier since he's older. Then used a large window sealer to line the sharp plastic edges with. I used a lawn bag as a liner, but I think I'll have to use the black trash bags. I live in an apartment so using liners to keep it clean is more ideal since I don't have a yard to wash the box out.
customer_reviews.author: suzie narog

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for large breed cats!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, I loved it so much that I ordered another one for upstairs. I have a Maine Coon cat, and at 6 months, he had already outgrown the other “large” litter box he had. This one has plenty of room, would also be good for multiple cats. The sides are high enough to keep litter scatter to a minimum. The two storage compartments are perfect for your scoop, waste bags, etc. Just be aware that it is HUGE, so make sure you have the space to fit it.
customer_reviews.author: Roux T

customer_reviews.title: Vary happy
customer_reviews.text: This box is large all the way around. It is wide, long, and deep. My cats don't have any issues getting in or out of it though. I can easily put 2-3" of litter in it and not have them fling it out everywhere like they do with shorter boxes. I especially like having a place to put the scooper so it isn't just laying all gross on the floor. This is a well thought out sturdy useable box. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Biggest litter box I could find
customer_reviews.text: My cat had a huge litter box for years, biggest I could find, because He is really big and his rear hung over the sides of even jumbo litter boxes. The old box finally cracked so I started looking for something of a similar size and this was the only one I could find. It is a couple of inches smaller overall, but otherwise very comparable. I and others big cat owners are so thankful for products like this!
customer_reviews.author: Aremism

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this HUGE box
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this litter pan. I have a large Maine coon and he was having issues with smaller litter pans. This pan is HUGE! It takes about 30 lbs of litter. It’s easy to clean, but I also use a non clay litter which helps. It doesn’t have a cover so I feel like I can smell this box faster after my cat has used it compared to a covered box. My cats choose to use this box over the other boxes I have in the house so that tells you something.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnee

customer_reviews.title: As big as Two litter boxes, fits in bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Rather than have multiple seperate litter boxes, I got two of these. Two of these are equal to four litter boxes. Each of them sits in an unused bathtub. If you shut the shower curtain except for a tiny opening, the cats will use that opening, and then you can put a litter mat directly below that opening. The shower curtain acts as a "soft restraint" to keep them from spreading litter everywhere on the bathroom floor. Use Grass Seed litter and you won't smell urine; EVER. The two accessory bins are nice. One holds the scoop, the other holds the cat food bag that I put the poop and pee balls in.
customer_reviews.author: topazgirl

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best litter box I have ever owned, and I’ve owned just about every kind out there. It is large enough for my almost 25 pound cat to fit in, with extra room to move. Both of my 20+ pound cats can fit it in together, with ease. It has high sides to stop litter from escaping. It’s super easy to scoop the yuck out, without leaving wet mess behind. Bonus are the storage spaces!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Just right for adult 10LB cat
customer_reviews.text: I am a volunteer cat foster dad. Most adult cats that come to my foster room have a history of litter box issues. This litter box ends all that, plenty of room for the cat to get the business done without having to squeeze into a too-small litter box. Yes, I was shocked when I received this litter box, because of its size. But it works, is easy to take care of and my foster cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Erdman

customer_reviews.title: I Like It A Lot
customer_reviews.text: I have a 17 lb. female cat so I don’t have problems with her spraying her pee over a box. However, she does like to cover her business very well, which means she is pawing at the litter quite vigorously. This box has stopped any litter flying out and it’s big enough for her to move around in. I don’t feel like the size is unmanageable at all. I’m very pleased with it and I think it would be great for big cats.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: "Giant" does not even begin to explain how large this litter box is! I have a huge Main Coon, who is 30lb and well over twice the size of a normal cat. We've had issues finding a litter box that is large enough to accommodate him, and this one does the trick. What I especially like about this is that the box is extra long but not extra wide, which means that when I put the long side against the wall, the box doesn't really "stick out" more than my other boxes. The place on the side for the litter scoops is a nice touch. I'm happy with this box.
customer_reviews.author: P. Zack

customer_reviews.title: If you want big, you'll get big!
customer_reviews.text: This is very spacious so if that's what you need, go for it. Love the storage space for scoops or other litter box supplies. Because it is an open litter box, you will need to scoop regularly compared to an enclosed one. I've cleaned it twice with just a good spraying of a nozzled hose with no problems of litter remaining clumped to the pan material. Sturdy. Well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: holy cow!
customer_reviews.text: Why have I not heard of this litter box before now! If you have multiple cats or large cats, this is a must have. Beware tho, it's huge, you will need the space for it! We have two adult cats and we were cleaning their old litter box at least 2xs a day. I still prefer to clean out their wastes 2xs a day but if I forget or don't have time and it goes 24 hours, no problem, everything is still buried! Just make sure you put 4 inches of litter in it. So far, no wastes are on the sides, no scraping litter mud from the sides or bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Great high side box. Holds ~30lb litter. Great for messy/multiple cats
customer_reviews.text: This is a great box. We have multiple cats and this will easily hold 30lb of litter. It has high sides so the cats don’t flick litter over the edge very easily. Also, we have one that likes to pee in the corner of the box and the high sides on this box have kept the pee in the box instead of down the outside and out. The box has a non stick floor that works for a bit but will wear out after you scoop it enough. We replace our box every six months because plastics absorb odors. The side pockets hold a scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: If you have the space this litter box is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: My giant kitty (20 lbs) needed a giant litter box, and they are not kidding on this one. This thing is HUGE - the first time my cat used it she looked like a little kitten in the corner lol. But since we got it she hasn't pooped on the floor and doesn't then scrape litter out of the box to try to cover it so hurray for small miracles. Not good if you don't have a bunch of space for your litter box, but we use an old walk in closet as the cat's "bedroom" (hey it was the kids' idea!) so we had plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Our Cats Like It
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 cats, and we use this one large litter box and it works great. Cleaning it once or twice a day is more than enough to keep up with the number of cats we have. Typically we keep about 25lbs of litter in it, and that allows for it to have about 3" or so of fresh litter. The box is sturdy and easy to move should you need to move it around.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: LARGEST LITTER BOX EVER! EXCELLENT DESIGN!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is the same size as my Jack Russell. Previously, the largest pan i could find would not work for him. He had to keep his front half out of the pan to use it. Then get out, turn around just to be able to cover it up. This pan is HUGE! It works wonderfully and has two storage places on the side where we keep the scoop and bags.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Love it, have purchased 3x now.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats. They have their own litter boxes but prefer to share, so we got this one- both for that reason, and also because one of them acts like he's digging out of Shawshank when he uses the box. This is large enough for both of them, and prevents him from kicking up litter over the sides. Plus it has convenient side compartments for a scoop and bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jesseekab

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: This product came in dirty scratched up and used thoroughly disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Chere

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: By far the biggest cat litter box I have ever seen anywhere. And the price is excellent. I like the two compartments to hold things like the scooper, etc. I had a jumbo cat box for my one cat. She is a senior cat and seemed to be having trouble turning around and getting comfortable using her usual box. So, I purchased this to give her PLENTY of room.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, make your cat happy!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! Our 14 lbs cat can turn around now and dig without having litter all around the box and on the floor. First time he climbed in, he actually paced back and forth few times to make sure this is really happening :) Yes, it's huge and yes, it will take around 10 lbs of litter, but it's sooo worth it, for your cats happiness
customer_reviews.author: YanaR

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was cheaper than a covered box and had higher sides than what I had at the time. I was hopeful that my cat wouldnt be able to kick the litter over the taller edge. It was a success! Much less waste, odor, and there is storage for the scoop. It is much larger than I had anticipated but not a big deal. I actually saw that my two 1 year old cats were able to use it at the same time, it is that big.
customer_reviews.author: Kesen1

customer_reviews.title: Huge litter box!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large litter box. I have three cars and wanted to give them lots of room. This does the trick! I like that there are little storage areas to hold the scoops. We fill it about half way full of sand (that’s a lot of sand!) unfortunately it really doesn’t contain it. I still have litter training down the hall. Not sure if my cats are just extra messy. But I was hoping the height of it would contain the litter a little better.
customer_reviews.author: S. McCreath

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t let down the meaning of GIANT
customer_reviews.text: If you have big cats or simply multiple cats like myself then this is for you. I know this may not be very fancy or pretty as the many others but your cats will love it and will thank you. The size of this is truly impressive and though it may seem excessive at first but once you see your cats using it all goes right with the world. Love the side compartments for the scooper and plastic bags. I will be buying another one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Large. Great for multi-cat homes
customer_reviews.text: I like the really large size of this but I really wish that there wasn't a curve on one of the long sides. It makes it a little more difficult to scoop out the corners because one of my cats pees right along the walls of the box, so it always sticks to wall and with the curve it is less than a 90° angle to get the scopin the corners. I wish it were a perfect rectangle. I like the side caddys, super convenient for a little dustpan set and the scooper. All in all, I'm sure I will buy one again eventually but I would say this is almost perfect.
customer_reviews.author: 1r2ns

customer_reviews.title: They're not kidding about "giant"
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. I should have paid more attention to the measurements. I bought it for the built in scoop holders and anti-microbial plastic. It is made from heavy duty plastic that seems to be very good quality. I did underestimate the size due to the very reasonable price. Small litter boxes of more questionable quality cost more. 5 stars because it is exactly as described and appears to be a great product. Unfortunately is just to big for the space it was intended to go in . I ended up donating it to a local rescue. They seemed thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: B_C

customer_reviews.title: Great for big cats!
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty big. I got it for my cat who recently decided he was too big for all of the other boxes we have. He is about 20lbs and pretty long, but this still gives him plenty of room to move around. My other cat is about 9lbs and you could put her and three of her friends in the box before you'd take up all the room. Side note, we use the Platinum Slide litter and so far nothing has stuck to the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really is Jumbo Sized
customer_reviews.text: This really is a jumbo sized litter box. If you have multiple cats or one "jumbo" sized kitty, I highly recommend it. It's deep enough for them to dig without throwing litter all over the floor (although mine still manage to get some out) and the 2 pockets fit my scooper perfectly. Litter does end up in the pockets but it only takes a few seconds to vacuum it out. If you have smaller kitties or kittens they may trouble getting in it though so I would consider that first.
customer_reviews.author: kyrstin

customer_reviews.title: BIGGEST Litter Box!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 cats, 2 of which all of a sudden no longer wanted to go outside anymore, so I needed a big litter box to accommodate them. This is definitely the largest litter box I found! The sides are nice & high, preventing most of the licked litter from ending up on the floor. FYI, it does take about 25lbs of litter to create a good layer. But overall we’re very happy w/this very large litter box! And for the price w/prime, you can’t beat it cuz another company would charge a good amount for shipping w/the size! Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: navywatters

customer_reviews.title: Gigantor
customer_reviews.text: Very large pan. Holds about 40 pounds of litter. It's a little taller than I would have liked, but both my cats seem to be able to get in and out without miuch difficulty. They took to it right away, even playing in it before I got it set up with litter. The 2 catches on the end are sufficient to hold giant scoop. or litter liners if you use them. Although urine doesn't seem to stick to the box itself. Both my cats are quite large and this is the perfect size for them. We call it the gigantor box.
customer_reviews.author: Deziz World

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box for 2 cats!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome if you scoop litter daily (no less than every other day). I have two cats and this box stops them from "missing" and getting fluids outside the box since they are sharing the box. I use a scoopable litter so lifting is never done with the box is full - weight is not a problem. Use a vacuum hose to clean the two side scooper holders if you use it to store them. This does take approximately 30 lbs of litter to have a good base so I wouldn't recommend regular litter if you rather empty and replace litter instead of scooping.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Litter Box!
customer_reviews.text: Have a new cat that needed more room than the covered cat box had, decided to try an open one instead of the one with the cover, this thing is great! It's huge, tons of room for scratching and doing their thing! Easy to clean and maintain. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RunnerCat

customer_reviews.title: A must for big cats
customer_reviews.text: We finally found the perfect litter box for our 17 lb cat. His previous litter box was waaay to small for him and he would get litter stuck to his butt and paws all the time. He no longer has issues with that and seems much happier with this box. I like the built in pockets for the scoop and whatever else you want to put in there. I couldn't get a pic of him in his box but I posted a pic so you can see how big he is.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnb

customer_reviews.title: HUGE litter box!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This box is great if you have a large cat like main coon or similar. The description of the item online was also very accurate, unlike the other box I purchased from Nature's Miracle, that provided dimensions of the box at the top where it is the largest. But on the bottom it was 2-3" smaller. The box from petmate is very large. This you should definitely have a large area to place this at. It could be a bit taller, but it will work for my cat who got tired of his other litter boxes and decided to go outside of the box. Love the purchase and if goes on sale I will definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Cadillac of litter boxes
customer_reviews.text: This is the cadillac of litter boxes and provides a lot of space fot kitty to do her business inside the litter box. Don't even bother trying another one...this is the best one I've found. I purchased a second one too, that's how impressed I am with this product.
customer_reviews.author: CUshopping

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is amazing. We have two cats. A shorthair kitten and a 12 year old ragdoll. The litter box we purchased from a big box store just wasn’t cutting it. Our big boy barely bit and couldn’t really move but with this box, he had more room. Very sturdy. We also love that it has slots on the side. We keep the scooper and baking soda on the side for easy access. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great for "drama" cats.
customer_reviews.text: Solves most of the "litter box drama" with the large sides so way less cleaning up after my 3 cats. Need a fairly large place to keep it as it is huge. Only problem is the 2 compartments are not removable so litter gets in them and only way to clean them is a vacuum. I don't store bags in them as suggested because you would scatter more litter when pulling a bag out. Overall though, it's a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Barb M

customer_reviews.title: Best BIG litter box
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several different cat boxes over the years and no matter what, my two cats seem to always make a mess with the litter getting outside the box!! This box however has helped with that issue tremendously! It really is GIANT and gives the cats plenty of room to take care of business and still keep the litter inside the box. The compartments on the end are great for holding the scooper and freshener too!! Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: Huge litter pan!!
customer_reviews.text: This litter pan is huge! We have four cats who aren't the brightest in the box. They still managed to PEE ON THE SIDE!? How? There's so much room! I give up. It's a great buy for such a large pan. It's two dollars cheaper now than it was when I bought it. Go figure, lol. For those who have pee issues with cats not using the box, remember to always have one box per cat plus one extra. Cats are weird and finicky about their boxes and cleaning the box regularly is a must! P.s. if you have kids they will love the box the pan comes in its ginormous.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron daily

customer_reviews.title: More for your money
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great litter box. It's much bigger than the average or even the jumbo size. I have some jumbo ones now that work great, but needed one additional due to my cats occasionally going on the floor vs in the box. I got this box, filled it with litter and gave not had an "accident" since. Highly recommend this box. Real value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and gigantic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and gigantic. This litter box is truly huge - requires 2 full size jugs of Tidy cat cat litter to properly fill. It is also very long - I had to cut the pockets of the end to get it to fit in the closet I have it in. The material cuts very easily with a jig saw and a blade for metal and the edges are easily sanded smooth. I needed a new litter box since my new male kitty shredded the liners I was using in my old litter box. I run this one without liners and it works great for a 2 cat household.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this litter box
customer_reviews.text: I love this litter box!!! I have 4 cats so we have always had three big litter boxes for them. Three had always worked well because they were always cleaned daily. Well one of my big fats cats decided that he would start pooping on the floor right in front of the litter boxes. I finally realized that maybe he was just too big and wanted more room. Well in comes this giant litter box. It is huge and now my big fat cat is happy. I have been able to eliminate all of the other boxes and solely use this one box for all four cats! It makes daily cleanings sooo much easier and all cats are happy!
customer_reviews.author: totesmegoats

customer_reviews.title: SMART INVESTMENT :)
customer_reviews.text: OK SO I HAVE TWO CATS AND THIS WORKS PERFECTLY FOR THEM BOTH. IT'S NOT SMALL AT ALL, I HAD BOUGHT THIS BEFORE A FEW YEARS AGO SO GLAD I MADE SURE TO PLACE IT IN MY SAVE FOR LATER OR ONE OF MY LIST CATEGORIES. . YOU WILL BE VERY GLAD YOU PURCHASED THIS.
customer_reviews.author: LACE17

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this box... bigger is better! They don’t have to squinch up in a little box, they can stretch out. I had another regular size litter box in my house since it’s 2 floors but I noticed the cats were going downstairs to use the big box. I like the 2 holes, I put the scooper in one and a bag in the other.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple or unique cats (or both).
customer_reviews.text: We have three cats, and they took our old litter box by storm. One will only go if there is at least 3" of litter in the pan, the second is a digger, and the third likes to nap in the litter box. (Special I know!) This litter box is ideal for all three. The pan is deep enough that Luna can dig without getting everywhere and Gus Gus still has enough litter. As for the naps in the pan, well we are working on that. The cat pan was well worth the money spent and I would buy it again in a heartbeat. The scoop rest is an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Big Kitty Approved
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these litter boxes in my house because I have multiple large cats. One of my cats is over 30 inches long from nose to base of tail and she does not comfortably fit in regular size cat boxes. She hasn’t been able to use a hooded cat box in years because they are all too small for her. With these boxes she has plenty of room to do her thing. The scooper holder is great because I can leave a scoop at each box which makes cleaning the cat boxes a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made Giant Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: This giant litter box is very well made and designed. It is easy to clean and does not absorb odors after easy cleaning. It is very durable and I especially like that is has high sides which is great for my large male cats who like to throw the pine litter after usage and do not like boxes with tops. I highly recommend this and keep purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: 1VAarcher

customer_reviews.title: GIANT cat box
customer_reviews.text: We bought one from unnamed pet store near us at triple the price. The cats loved it so much that we ordered 2 more from this seller for so much less. Our cats no longer use their regular size litter boxes (even if they are clean.) Lesson learned: pet stores mark things WAAAAAY up to take advantage of customers, just because they can.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Best litter box I’ve bought!
customer_reviews.text: Love these litter pans! Cats can’t kick litter out as easy. No more mess with cats and going right outside the box due to not being big enough. These give tons of room. Can fill with more litter and scoop every other day instead of daily. Litter scoop holder is quite convenient. Only complaint is when emptying it’s a bid tedious due to the size and bulkiness of the box.
customer_reviews.author: hmoten02

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This litter pan in humongous! I’ve purchased other litter pans in the past and my cats (4) kick the litter out. This pan is big enough for big cats (extra large main coon) and they don’t fight over it. You’ll definitely need a large area to store it.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Monty

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the hunt for 4 years for the perfect litter box that all three of the cats will like to use and I have finally found it! Love how large it is. I will be ordering a second one soon to replace the other 2 top entry boxes we are using along side this one. My cats 100% prefer to use the large, open one to them and it makes it nice to be able to go away for the weekend knowing they have enough surface area to use until we come back to clean it out. Great litter box!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: A THRONE BIG ENOUGH FOR PRINCE
customer_reviews.text: I can only say WOW! Thanks for making this a bigger one. I could EASILY set in this box. 5 minutes in a new spot, and my Prince fou4thnd his new throne. He is a 15 pound cat, and looks like a mice in this giant litter box. I highly recommend. Also was able to use Jumbo Jonny Cat Heavy Duty Liner. But a little small. As you can see they'll work for now. I Will update again soon 4/26/17 😆
customer_reviews.author: Ms. SSR

customer_reviews.title: Largest pan I can find
customer_reviews.text: Having 2 large cats this is the ONLY litter box I can find they 1) fit and 2) not miss the litter or be able to cover it. This is way high, but long - I still need one LONGER but no where is there one I know how to find. Love this but DO NOT need the end with hte holes for the scooper. That would be PERFECT extra room. It is super heavy and being a senior adult it is difficult to lift to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Peg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for multiple cats or large cats, easy to clean and a fantastic price. A+ for cats and cat owners.
customer_reviews.text: It is a giant litter box. Best parts about this: A) It is easy to clean B) Larger cats can get in and out very easily.C) It is priced very affordably D) It is a neutral color and can go just about anywhere and E) If you get to a point where you want to clean it out completely and start from scratch, you can easily pour litter in garbage bags and then hose it out and then place fresh litter inside. We have larger cats and this is so much easier to deal with than a regular size litter box and we do not have to deal with the hassle of litter bags. Just get a nice metal scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: This thing is bonkers big and I love it. My cat always tossed and tracked litter ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is bonkers big and I love it. My cat always tossed and tracked litter everywhere because he kicks hard when he's digging, and this almost completely contains it. Plus as an added bonus, extra volume means it doesn't have to be cleaned as often as a smaller box would. As other reviewers mentioned, "giant" truly means "GIANT," but it's what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ghattas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for bigger cats
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pan for 7 months now. I have 2 big cats and its roomy enough for both. Clean up is easy, just soap, water and a bit of scrubbing and it still looks new. So, the scratching with claws has not messed up the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Leah A

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: If you have issues with your cat being too big for his small box, this will solve your issue. It’s awesome! I have four cats and I’ll be purchasing a second one of these boxes soon. 11/10 and hands down the easiest box to clean I’ve ever scooped poop out of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is HUGE!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a main coon cat and have been having trouble with him using the litter boxes. Hes just so BIG that the boxes were too small so he didn't like them. Not a problem any more! This thing is huge! He has plenty of room to do his business and turn around now. I LOVE this litter box. And the two storage compartments are guiness!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy this litter box.
customer_reviews.text: Love this litter box! I have a Maine coon and he kept growing out of every litter box within the 1st year! He was 9 months old and couldn’t fit into your typical cat litter box! This was cheap in price compared to what they want at the stores for around the same size- great quality we now have a new kitten who is still able to jump inside it and use it. Both him and my Maine Coon both use it just fine. It’s huge though!!! I’ll never purchase a regular litter box again!
customer_reviews.author: robynn kunco

customer_reviews.title: Main Coon
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem when Chloe would fill her normal littler box with 3 or 4 urine's the poo would go on the floor. She is just picky like that, I bought this 3 weeks ago and it accommodates her size so well. No more issues and she uses it. The holders on the sides I use for the scoop and the other for bags. Just a Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Helps with cats that accidentally drop it over the side...and for mullti-cat homes
customer_reviews.text: Where the cats used to do it outside of the box, and elsewhere in the house; now they do it in this BIG box. Maybe it was that the old female couldn't tell where her butt began and ended and so with a lower sided box "it" fell out...or maybe with a bigger box there is more chance for the cat to have a clean area with less changing. Anyway it has made life easier with 3 cats. (Also added other cat boxes)
customer_reviews.author: CryeffTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome large litterbox
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd of this same litterbox that I have ordered. It is large and really deep, to ensure everyone is going in the box with no issues. It is lightweight itself to carry, but very sturdy. The curved side is great to put on the hip to carry. The side pockets are great storage for bags and a scoop....or, as I had yesterday, a kitten inside. This is a great product and would definitely recommend. Shipping was quick and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great deal - HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I had to laugh when I opened the box because didn't realize the measurements. But they are great. No wonder I could only order 3! They are easy to clean... As far as scent, I don't like to comment of this because I clean boxes everyday so I don't have issues with smell regardless of the box I use.
customer_reviews.author: Romana C Straley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these giant litter pans and they are fantastic! I had a problem with my cat going over the edge of the box and this does not happen anymore, as this litter pan is so deep. I have eight cats and three of these boxes are perfect! One giant pan can take the place of two to three standard size litter pans. The extra compartments are great for the litter scoop. If you have multiple cats, this is the box for you.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Casey

customer_reviews.title: PURR-FECT for my Maine Coon and nice and deep for deep diggers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Petmate 22040 Giant Litter box is a Godsend! I have a ginormous Main Coin that had to squeeze into the typical large litterbox. He'd have to stand outside of the box to cover. Not anymore! He has loads of room to comfortably take care of buisness. It holds 30#s of litter giving approx 5"-6" of litter that is perfect for cats that are deep diggers. No more scraping cement-like substances from the bottom!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Chick

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the greatest litter box we have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the greatest litter box we have ever used. It's made of high quality materials and holds more than 2 boxes of litter. I have 2 cats and previously used 2 different litter boxes. I replaced them with this and it is so much easier to clean and keep maintained. My cats also love it and it is big enough that they don't feel territorial about sharing. I also love the scooper and bag holder. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Comically Ginormous! Big-butted-cat owners rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: So I have two cats, and one is really big (like 20 pounds), and she has no clue how giant her butt is. As a result, she frequently pees outside her litter box because she literally is unaware she isn’t fully in the box, the poor idiot. No longer!!! This box is huge! We’ve had it for a couple month now and have had NO accidents (before, there were accidents like two or three times a week)! Absolutely a saving grace for us!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great solution
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, love it. Our cat doesn't throw litter everywhere as much anymore, also she doesn't pee on the sides of the box, I have to clean it less often, and it fits in the bathroom we designated for her! Exactly what I wanted. The cat also appreciated the giant cardboard box it came in ;)
customer_reviews.author: Valkyrie

customer_reviews.title: Best BIG litterbox ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for years to find big litterboxes and finally gave up and started using plastic rubbermaid tubs, which are not easy to clean because of the grooves in the bottom. Saw this box and decided to try one last time - these are SUPER HUGE and plenty big enough for my 24lb and 18lb Siberian cats to fit into. Low enough at front for my 17 year old, arthritic cat to step in and out of, and high enough on sides & back to prevent spilling too much litter for the diggers in the bunch. Highly recommend if you have big cats!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple cats
customer_reviews.text: Had five cats using this at once. Worked well all day long until I had to come home from work just the usual amount any cat would fling out litter. Side trays are awesome place for the poop scooper had multiple ones. Very stylish and tall think it's perfect if you have more than 2 cats
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: With having 2 cats, one larger (to big to use a regular pan), this is perfect. What ever this is made of, it makes for easy cleaning/scooping with using regular cat litter. Easy to clean any mess left on the side of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: LARGE LITTER BOX
customer_reviews.text: Love this litter box! My cat isn't that big so I thought a regular-sized box would work, but she kept backing up and peeing down the corner and it would go outside the box and on to the floor. This is high enough that she can't do that anymore. It holds a lot of littler and the compartments on the side can hold the tools you use to clean it. It's perfect, wish I would have bought it sooner, would have saved me a lot of extra clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy J.

customer_reviews.title: it's huge (that's what she said)
customer_reviews.text: if you want a huge litterbox this is the one for you. I spent hours researching & reading litterbox reviews on Amazon and this is the one! (see my pic of it next to standard litterboxes) the problem with pee getting outside the box is over thank goodness. I also ordered the Easyology Jumbo mat to go under it, I love that thing as well
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Large, sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: After buying the first of these I bought 3 more because they’re the perfect size for my 33 and 32 lb Maine Coons. I didn’t want the extra pockets on the end so my husband removed them and smoothed the edges. They’re easy to clean daily....I use Feline Pine....and very sturdy for large breed cats.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky J. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Best litter box for large cats!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a large cat, then this is your litter box. I’ve had one for 10 years and bought this one for my 30 lb. big Bob. It is not flimsy. It holds a lot of litter. The scoop is right there for when you clean it out. This is a product I stand behind as the best litter box for big cats!
customer_reviews.author: tracey68

customer_reviews.title: Really good product. Someone who has cats designed this for sure-
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats, one small house cat and 2 big Persians. This litter box is gigantic and I laughed when it came in the mail-but--it's perfect and a great size for big cats. My cats love it. Plenty of room for them to use!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: MEOW WOW
customer_reviews.text: This thing is massive! I set it up in my only bathroom, and my cats took turns trying it out. They all stood at my feet and in unison, said,"MEOW WOW" which meand... bomb diggity poop box and CAN WE HAVE A TREAT? Mostly the second thing. But seriously...sturdy. nice price. My cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tookie Clothespin

customer_reviews.title: This is the best buy on Amazon.  Super huge cat litter box.
customer_reviews.text: I love the deal. Look what you get for your money! How can they ship this huge box to me with this huge litter box inside for less than $15. I'm flabbergasted.
customer_reviews.author: Rich DavisTop Contributor: Ukuleles

customer_reviews.title: Great for larger cats.
customer_reviews.text: We have one of those cats that stands when he pees (not spraying) so we thought this would be a good solution. Still not tall enough (he is a 21 lb monster). We wound up putting cheap plastic flexible cutting boards taped to the sides to prevent overage. That aside, this is a great box for larger cats, a lot of room to stand and do their thing. The 2 cutouts to place a scoop(s) in is very convenient. Better than having to lay the scoop around on the floor or something. Very sturdy plastic and stable. It would be hard to spill much when stepping on the side. This is actually the second we've had and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Byron M.

customer_reviews.title: It's YUGE
customer_reviews.text: I know other reviewers have said this, but this box is HUGE. Easily fit two big or three normal sized cats inside. I like the convenience of having compartments to hold the litter scoops. The sides are also high enough up to keep some of the litter from getting everywhere. I use this with a jumbo litter mat and the litter has been contained in one area rather than tracked all over the house. Would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: GMaria

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats, perfect size if you only want to clean one box. When it gets gross after a few months we buy a new one. It will last forever though if you just spray it down. Great litter pan
customer_reviews.author: Netrocity

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for multi-cat home!
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say I love this litter box! So does my 3 cats! I was searching for a giant litter box for my furbabies, and came across this one. I'm glad that I did! It's huge and it has space for litter scoops, etc on the side which is a plus for me! At first, I didn't think my babies would like it but they prefer this big one over our sifting litter box. My oldest cat is a huge butt who loves kicking out litter, but in this litter box he doesn't do that! I highly recommend getting this giant litter box if you have multiple cats!
customer_reviews.author: Horror Queen

customer_reviews.title: They love. We love it.
customer_reviews.text: We have two ragdolls. One that's currently almost 12 lbs and the other 10 lbs. They have in corner litter with a hood. And we got this one since it was big and open and let me just say this has been a hit with our babies! Every time we go to clean the litter box. There's more clumps in this one than the other. I guess they like the open space and don't mind that everyone can see them. It's pretty big so take the size into consideration before buying. In the two spaces in the size we put our litter scoop and litter wipes. So everything is clean and out of the way. Happy cats means happy owners!
customer_reviews.author: Sori

customer_reviews.title: Best cat litter box available.
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 cats. Litter box is large enough and deep enough so the litter does not get thrown all over the floor. Two molded storage containers are a plus as it gives you a place to store the scoop, bags and other essentials. Good purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pechta

product_meta.title: Petmate Giant Litter Pan for Cat
product_meta.description: Size:GiantThe Petmate Giant Litter Pan is suitable for multi-cat households and large cats with its extra large capacity. The extra large litter box is designed to hold more than 30 pounds of litter. The high walls keep litter contained and prevent litter scatter. The design break pattern of the huge kitty litter box provides a more durable base that won't tip over. The two side storage compartments on the side of the jumbo cat litter box allow for convenient placement of litter scoops and disposal bags. The Petmate extra large cat litter box also has an increased handle area for easier lifting and moving. Features Microban Antimicrobial Product Protection to help prevent the growth of stain and odor-causing bacteria in the litter box. Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: OPEN-TOP KITTY LITTER BOX: This large cat litter pan provides ample space for cats to do their business comfortably. It features side storage to hold litter liner, bags & scoops. Holds up to 30 lbs. of litter.

KEEPS LITTER CONTAINED: The durable giant cat litter box features a wide base & high walls for litter-free floors. Features antimicrobial protection to help prevent the growth of stain & odor-causing bacteria.

PET CLEAN UP: Swiftly clean up after your dog or cat while at home or on walks with a variety of waste management products. From waste bags, rakes, pans, trainings pads to poop scoopers, litter boxes & litter, we've got you & your pet covered.

Petmate: For over 50 years, we at Petmate are passionate about our dogs, cats & furry friends in general. Starting with the very first dog kennel, we've produced plenty of eco-friendly products that pets will love.

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!
